locales.login_new_tit: Welcome to de crew, ya dirty dog!
locales.login_new_sub: Let's start by creating a password that will be used to encrypt all of your private data. Make sure it's strong (arr).
locales.login_new_password_plc: Make sure it's a strong password, or beware the wrath of Davey Jones!
locales.login_new_restore_backup_btn: I want to restorrre from a backup
locales.login_existing_reset_btn: I need to rrreset my password
locales.login_restore_sub:
If you have a backup for your Scatterrr you can import it here by loading it into Scatterrr. 
        You will still need the password to unlock it.
locales.login_restore_choose_btn: Choose your Backup, ya scurvy letch
locales.login_restore_back_btn: Go back and start from scratch
locales.dashboard_keys_no_keys: Well, what are ye waiting for?
locales.dashboard_apps_no_apps_desc: You can explore apps by searching for various things in the search field above.
locales.dashboard_apps_no_permissions: Be off with ya, there's no perrrmissions here
locales.add_keys_select_disclaimer: Private skeleton keys are created locally on your computer and never touch the internet.
locales.add_keys_select_create_tit: Create a new key, ya squinty eyed fish eater
locales.add_keys_select_create_desc: If you want to create a new set of skeleton keys that you can use on any blockchain. The skeleton keys will not have any funds on them, they are brand new.
locales.add_keys_select_import_desc: If you already have a skeleton key and want to import it into Scatterrr
locales.add_keys_select_create_eos_desc: We'll quickly generate two skeleton keys for you
locales.add_keys_import_name_plc: Give this skeleton key a name to remember.
locales.add_keys_import_text_tit: Import private skeleton key as text
locales.add_keys_import_text_desc: If you would like to type in or paste your private skeleton key
locales.add_keys_import_hw_desc: If you have a supported harrrdware wallet
locales.add_keys_import_qt_tit: Import private skeleton key from a Q-aRRR code
locales.add_keys_import_qr_desc: If you have an encrypted paper wallet Q-aRRR code
locales.add_keys_import_text_key_plc: Make sure to enter it correctly
locales.add_keys_import_text_errors_invalid_key_: Private skeleton key not long enough ({x})
locales.add_keys_import_hw_unlock_ledger_err: You need to unlock your ledger and open the {x} Ledger App, ya mangy skullywuggle.
locales.add_keys_import_hw_unlock_liq_eos_err: You need to unlock your Liquid EOS Harrrdware Wallet.
locales.add_keys_eos_keys_owner_desc: This is your master skeleton key which has total control over your account. Do not keep it in Scatterrr unless you want to sleep with the fishes
locales.add_keys_eos_keys_active_desc: This is the skeleton key you will use with applications. It is what you want to keep imported into Scatterrr.
locales.add_keys_eos_keys_create_eos_acc_tit: Use these skeleton keys to create an EOS account.
locales.add_keys_eos_keys_create_eos_acc_desc: You can not instantly use EOS with just skeleton keys, you need to create an account with them.
locales.create_eos_disc_tit: Accounts on the EOS blockchain must be paid for to be able to be used.
locales.create_eos_acc_name_len_err: Account name must be 12 characters long.
locales.create_eos_acc_name_form_err: Account name must be lowercase letters only.
locales.create_eos_sel_creator_err: Please select an account creator first.
locales.create_eos_account_acc_lbl: This account will be used to create the account
locales.create_eos_exchange_info_tit: You need to pay for the resources needed to create accounts on the EOS blockchain.
locales.create_eos_exchange_info_sub: All of the extra funds you send will be transferred to the account.
locales.create_eos_exchange_sent_tit: After sending EOS from an exchange with the above details, copy the transaction ID here.
locales.create_eos_exchange_sent_sub: You must wait for the transaction to be irreversible, this takes around 3 minutes.
locales.create_eos_errors_invalid_res: Either CPU or NET was below or equal to 0
locales.keypair_name_plc: Give this skeleton key a name to remember.
locales.keypair_dashboard_add_account_create_eos: If you want to create a new EOS account on top of this skeleton key.
locales.keypair_dashboard_add_account_link_eos_d: If you already have an EOS account, but it's not being imported automatically.
locales.keypair_dashboard_errors_invalid_wallet_: Enter a name for this Skeleton Key
locales.keypair_dashboard_errors_wallet_name_exi: A Skeleton Key with this name already exists
locales.keypair_accounts_eos_danger_perms: Both active and owner are on the same skeleton key.
locales.keypair_accounts_eos_danger_perms_sub: Consider changing one to another skeleton key by clicking the "change perrrmissions" button below.
locales.keypair_export_select_key_desc: Export this Private Skeleton Key as text
locales.keypair_export_select_qr_desc: Export this Private Skeleton Key as an encrypted QR code
locales.identity_disclaimer_tit_imp: Nothing here is required in order to use Scatterrr, ya molty munch
locales.identity_disclaimer_tit: but it might be required by some applications connecting to your Scatterrr, for instance when using a shopping application that needs your shipping address.
locales.identity_disclaimer_sub: All information is stored locally on your computer and is never sent anywhere without your consent.
locales.identity_name_err: The Identity Name name can not be empty, have any spaces in it, or special characters.
locales.identity_location_disclaimer_sub: For instance "Home" and "Work". You will be able to select which one to use when you need it.
locales.identity_location_name_err: Location names must not be empty.
locales.permissions_rem_id_lbl:
Login perrrmissions are what allow applications to interact with your Scatterrr.
        You can force a log-out from an application by removing this perrrmissions.
locales.permissions_rem_white_lbl:
Action whitelists make it so you don't have to keep accepting popups to sign transactions.
        Do you want to remove this whitelist?
locales.settings_general_white_noti_desc: These notifications appear on certain operating systems when you auto-sign whitelisted transactions.
locales.settings_general_data_path_desc: The location on your computer that Scatterrr saves it's encrypted data to.
locales.settings_general_dev_console_desc: Sometimes you might need to see if Scatterrr is throwing any errors.
locales.settings_tokens_add_token_disclaimer: Adding tokens will allow you to send them and fetch their balances.
locales.settings_tokens_add_token_tok_name_plc: Name this token or leave empty to use it's symbol.
locales.settings_tokens_settings_main_bal_dis_de: You can set whether you want to see balances for all networks in the main dashboard, or just balances for mainnets.
locales.settings_tokens_settings_main_bal_dis_ma: Displaying only mainnet tokens means Scatterrr will not use alternate chain or testnet chain tokens to calculate total balances.
locales.settings_tokens_settings_main_bal_dis_al: Showing all networks means Scatterrr will take every network into consideration when calculating total balances.
locales.settings_tokens_settings_filter_small_ba: If you want to always filter out tokens with small balances you can set a modifier here.
locales.settings_tokens_white_black_whitelist_di: Select any token or currency to make it your main display type.
locales.settings_tokens_white_black_blacklist_di: You cannot filter out system tokens for your networks.
locales.settings_pin_desc: Your PIN is a secondary internal password for doing Transfers.
locales.settings_pin_desc_red: Do not make your PIN the same as your password!
locales.settings_pin_pin_4_all_desc: If you enable this you will also need to enter your PIN for every popup.
locales.settings_networks_known_add_desc: You can add highly used blockchain networks easily without having to enter their details manually.
locales.settings_networks_custom_cus_sys_tok_des: In some cases you might need to change the system token.
locales.settings_networks_custom_using_cus_sys_t: This network is using a custom token.
locales.settings_password_cng_pass_desc: Every time you change your password you will get a new Mnemonic ( Seed Phrase ) which is your alternate password for unlocking Scatterrr.
locales.settings_password_view_mne_desc: If you've lost your password's mnemonic alternative you can view it here.
locales.settings_backup_desc: Backups allow you to save the state of your entire Scatterrr including all skeleton keys, perrrmissionss and settings.
locales.settings_firewall_enabled_desc: RIDL Defender is Scatterrr's proprietary decentralized firewall system. It helps protect you from malicious websites, applications, and accounts.
locales.settings_destroy_desc:
Destroying your Scatterrr will remove all your data including your Identities and Keypair configurations from your local machine.
        It will not delete your blockchain accounts from the actual blockchain.
locales.settings_destroy_imp: MAKE SURE YOU HAVE A BACKUP BEFORE YOU DO THIS!
locales.history_clearing_history_txt: Your history in Scatter is only stored locally. If you clear it you will not be able to restore it.
locales.exchange_cant_connect: Can't connect to the Exhange API.
locales.exchange_disclaimer_tit: Please note that this is an estimate!
locales.exchange_disclaimer_desc: Token prices could change between now and the time it takes to complete the exchange. You may get slightly more or less than estimated.
locales.snackbar_cont_exists: Another contact already has this recipient
locales.snackbar_cont_name_exists: Another contact already has this name
locales.snackbar_network_miss_port: Network must have a valid port
locales.snackbar_network_miss_chain: Network must have a chain id
locales.snackbar_network_chain_exists: A network with this chain id already exists
locales.snackbar_network_name_exists: A network with this name already exists
locales.snackbar_tokens_miss_symbol: You must add a token symbol
locales.snackbar_tokens_miss_contract: You mnust add a token contract
locales.snackbar_tokens_exists_added: This token already exists in added tokens
locales.snackbar_tokens_exists_filtered: Token already exists in filtered tokens
locales.snackbar_auth_locked_out: You have been locked out temporarily
locales.snackbar_auth_pass_len: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long
locales.snackbar_auth_bad_conf: The confirmation does not match the password
locales.popouts_login_acc_reqs: App requires accounts for these networks
locales.popouts_login_no_accs_tit: You do not have blockchain accounts for the networks that this application requires.
locales.popouts_login_no_accs_desc: Before logging into this application go back to Scatterrr and import some skeleton keys for the network/blockchain that this application is using.
locales.popouts_login_miss_fields_desc: Fill out the inputs below which will add those fields to your Identity for later use and also return them to the application.
locales.popouts_link_app_disclaimer: Make sure the application name is an application you are interacting with right now.
locales.popouts_signature_arb_dis_desc: To protect you we have disabled the ability to sign arbitrary data that is longer than 12 characters per word.
locales.popouts_signature_whitelist_desc: Whitelist this to not have to accept next time
locales.popins_fullscreen_check_hardware_desc: You should see a confirmation on your harrrdware device.
locales.popins_fullscreen_destroy_disc: Before doing this, make sure you have all of your Private Skeleton Keys backed up.
locales.popins_fullscreen_destroy_desc: Destroying your Scatterrr is irreversible, and you will not be able to restore any data without backups.
locales.popins_fullscreen_whitelisting_desc: Whitelisting actions makes it so you don't have to keep approving actions for applications you trust.When whitelisting actions you will see checkboxes appear next to each action and value.
locales.popins_fullscreen_whitelisting_mutable_p: this value will be able to change without a popup
locales.popins_fullscreen_whitelisting_immutable: if this changes you will have to approve the action again
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_change_perms_desc: Changing your account's perrrmissionss means changing the skeleton keys that power the account.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_change_perms_sub_d: You can leave either field blank to keep the existing perrrmissions.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_change_perms_key_p: Enter a public skeleton key or account name
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_mod_cpunet_stake_d: Self staking CPU & NET will allow this account to do more on the blockchain.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_mod_cpunet_unstake: Unstaking CPU & NET will reclaim tokens, but will let you do less.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_mod_ram_buy_desc: Buying RAM will let this account hold more data on the blockchain.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_mod_ram_sell_desc: Selling RAM reclaims token to that account at the current price of RAM.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_proxy_repro_tit: Do you want to automatically re-proxy every 7 days?
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_proxy_repro_desc: If you enable this, accepting the initial transaction also accepts all future transactions too.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_proxy_plc: Enter the account name of a prrroxy
locales.popins_fullscreen_mnemonic_desc: This phrase is a backup for your password. It is not used to generate skeleton keys.
locales.popins_fullscreen_mnemonic_sub_desc: You can paste this phrase into any field that accepts a password in Scatterrr.
locales.popins_fullscreen_remove_key_disc: Removing skeleton keys also removes all of it's accounts and their application perrrmissionss.
locales.popins_fullscreen_unlink_account_desc: Removing a linked account also removes all of it's application perrrmissionss
locales.popins_fullscreen_unlink_account_sub_des: Select all the authorities you want to remove.
locales.popins_fullscreen_unlink_blockchain_disc: Unlinking a blockchain also removes all of it's accounts and their application perrrmissionss.
locales.popins_overlay_remove_app_desc: You are about to remove this application from your Scatterrr. This will also remove all whitelist perrrmissionss.
locales.popins_overlay_trx_success_desc: Click link below to view on {x}
locales.popins_overlay_update_avail_click_link: Click the link below to go to the downloads page
